custom-action.name: imported_rfc_connect
custom-action.description:
Opens an RFC connection to an SAP server.
Parameters: - destination: Unique name for each destination. NeoLoad creates a destination properties file with this name. - host: IP address or name of the SAP server. - sysnr: SAP system number. - client: Client code. - user: Login user ID. - password: Login password. - lang: Language. Default: en. - jco.client.<propertyName>: Advanced property to add to the destination properties. Example: jco.client.group=mygroup.
